questions.question: Shear stress at top most fibre of rectangular section is _____________

explanations.c:
The shear stress at a distance “y “ from NA = 6F/bd3 × u (u = d2/4-y).
The maximum shear stress occurs at a neutral axis. In the above equation when y is equal to zero, q is max. Hence the shear stress at topmost fibre of rectangular section is zero

questions.question: In a double shear test the specimen breaks into

explanations.a: In a double shear test the shear force is applied at two places and when the ultimate limit is reached the specimen breaks at both places into three pieces.

questions.question: The shearing force P in each section where force applied is (Total shear force = F)

explanations.c: In a double shear test the total shear force applied is divided equally at the two contact points.Hence if the total shear force is F, at one section the shear force is F/2
